definition: Han, one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄/Korea from the fall of the Joseon dynasty in 1897/Korea, esp. South Korea 大韓民國|大韩民国/surname Han

sentences.english: Finally we calculated standard land price of Han Cheng's commercial land in 2002.
sentences.chinese: 最終測算出2002年韓城市城區商業用地基準地價。

sentences.english: Liangdaicun site is located at a suburb northeast of Hancheng city, Shaanxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 梁帶村遺址位於陝西省韓城市東北郊。
